

  7. Get Case by ID - GET /cases/{caseId}
  8. Assign User to Case - PATCH /cases/{caseId}/assigned-user
  9. Add Note to Case - POST /cases/{caseId}/notes
  10. Complete First Stage Tasks - PATCH /cases/{caseId}/stages/{stageId}/task-groups/{taskGroupId}/tasks/{taskId}/status
  11. Move Case to Next Stage - POST /cases/{caseId}/stage
  12. Verify After Stage Move - GET /cases/{caseId}
  13. Complete Second Stage Tasks - Same as step 10 for stage 1
  14. Final Verification - GET /cases/{caseId}

# Integration Test Journey - Curl Commands


caseid = 
## Step 7: Get Case by ID
```bash
curl --location 'https://ephemeral-protected.api.perf-test.cdp-int.defra.cloud/fg-cw-backend/cases/{CASE_ID}' \
--header 'Content-Type: application/json' \
--header 'Accept: application/json' \
--header 'Authorization: Bearer eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJSUzI1NiIsIng1dCI6InlFVXdtWFdMMTA3Q2MtN1FaMldTYmVPYjNzUSIsImtpZCI6InlFVXdtWFdMMTA3Q2MtN1FaMldTYmVPYjNzUSJ9..F_Bv7n-wOgaBG5shoz65jcNLCc_1rZGL5k9HiOtTOw4vMBXOymtVbJNJeuSuRx1ERJkXHb15vxTqP67aEKEGGSvNwM9_5mHj54QXXOwWUDnnQL1TPRhuvxIHy6Y65ZR2QRrGGCuA45lTGdEbdzjnKBlTrfJkw_cBISVMurxx9D9qkB8iVEzWql24yZ28sRfqMHrqR3qTmye3XShdvbB6OZay6xfV8UF7t_bNV8rRk6snq9qnb3QF2T6GezzC7-1ALXbYIjqnR3Ty3sXzq6O-yGTI8_7AncOCqdxHg3L5lPNt36XpMkVK5rdbM7Kpivla1PhfiyAbU-iLpjmAOPP50A' \
--header 'x-api-key: 6QK0HOO85yA1FeR5Aaz7FJhf7B3ZMyCW'
```

## Step 8: Assign User to Case
```bash
curl --location --request PATCH 'https://ephemeral-protected.api.perf-test.cdp-int.defra.cloud/fg-cw-backend/cases/{CASE_ID}/assigned-user' \
--header 'Content-Type: application/json' \
--header 'Accept: application/json' \
--header 'Authorization: Bearer eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJSUzI1NiIsIng1dCI6InlFVXdtWFdMMTA3Q2MtN1FaMldTYmVPYjNzUSIsImtpZCI6InlFVXdtWFdMMTA3Q2MtN1FaMldTYmVPYjNzUSJ9..F_Bv7n-wOgaBG5shoz65jcNLCc_1rZGL5k9HiOtTOw4vMBXOymtVbJNJeuSuRx1ERJkXHb15vxTqP67aEKEGGSvNwM9_5mHj54QXXOwWUDnnQL1TPRhuvxIHy6Y65ZR2QRrGGCuA45lTGdEbdzjnKBlTrfJkw_cBISVMurxx9D9qkB8iVEzWql24yZ28sRfqMHrqR3qTmye3XShdvbB6OZay6xfV8UF7t_bNV8rRk6snq9qnb3QF2T6GezzC7-1ALXbYIjqnR3Ty3sXzq6O-yGTI8_7AncOCqdxHg3L5lPNt36XpMkVK5rdbM7Kpivla1PhfiyAbU-iLpjmAOPP50A' \
--header 'x-api-key: 6QK0HOO85yA1FeR5Aaz7FJhf7B3ZMyCW' \
--data '{
  "assignedUserId": "{USER_ID}"
}'
```

## Step 9: Add Note to Case
```bash
curl --location 'https://ephemeral-protected.api.perf-test.cdp-int.defra.cloud/fg-cw-backend/cases/{CASE_ID}/notes' \
--header 'Content-Type: application/json' \
--header 'Accept: application/json' \
--header 'Authorization: Bearer eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJSUzI1NiIsIng1dCI6InlFVXdtWFdMMTA3Q2MtN1FaMldTYmVPYjNzUSIsImtpZCI6InlFVXdtWFdMMTA3Q2MtN1FaMldTYmVPYjNzUSJ9..F_Bv7n-wOgaBG5shoz65jcNLCc_1rZGL5k9HiOtTOw4vMBXOymtVbJNJeuSuRx1ERJkXHb15vxTqP67aEKEGGSvNwM9_5mHj54QXXOwWUDnnQL1TPRhuvxIHy6Y65ZR2QRrGGCuA45lTGdEbdzjnKBlTrfJkw_cBISVMurxx9D9qkB8iVEzWql24yZ28sRfqMHrqR3qTmye3XShdvbB6OZay6xfV8UF7t_bNV8rRk6snq9qnb3QF2T6GezzC7-1ALXbYIjqnR3Ty3sXzq6O-yGTI8_7AncOCqdxHg3L5lPNt36XpMkVK5rdbM7Kpivla1PhfiyAbU-iLpjmAOPP50A' \
--header 'x-api-key: 6QK0HOO85yA1FeR5Aaz7FJhf7B3ZMyCW' \
--data '{
  "type": "NOTE_ADDED",
  "text": "Note added during integration testing workflow"
}'
```

## Step 10: Complete First Stage Tasks (called for each task in stage 0)
```bash
curl --location --request PATCH 'https://ephemeral-protected.api.perf-test.cdp-int.defra.cloud/fg-cw-backend/cases/{CASE_ID}/stages/{STAGE_ID}/task-groups/{TASK_GROUP_ID}/tasks/{TASK_ID}/status' \
--header 'Content-Type: application/json' \
--header 'Accept: application/json' \
--header 'Authorization: Bearer eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJSUzI1NiIsIng1dCI6InlFVXdtWFdMMTA3Q2MtN1FaMldTYmVPYjNzUSIsImtpZCI6InlFVXdtWFdMMTA3Q2MtN1FaMldTYmVPYjNzUSJ9..F_Bv7n-wOgaBG5shoz65jcNLCc_1rZGL5k9HiOtTOw4vMBXOymtVbJNJeuSuRx1ERJkXHb15vxTqP67aEKEGGSvNwM9_5mHj54QXXOwWUDnnQL1TPRhuvxIHy6Y65ZR2QRrGGCuA45lTGdEbdzjnKBlTrfJkw_cBISVMurxx9D9qkB8iVEzWql24yZ28sRfqMHrqR3qTmye3XShdvbB6OZay6xfV8UF7t_bNV8rRk6snq9qnb3QF2T6GezzC7-1ALXbYIjqnR3Ty3sXzq6O-yGTI8_7AncOCqdxHg3L5lPNt36XpMkVK5rdbM7Kpivla1PhfiyAbU-iLpjmAOPP50A' \
--header 'x-api-key: 6QK0HOO85yA1FeR5Aaz7FJhf7B3ZMyCW' \
--data '{
  "status": "complete",
  "comment": "Automated test completion"
}'
```

```bash

--header 'Content-Type: application/json' \
```

```bash
  "status": "complete",
  "comment": "Automated test completion"
}'
```

```bash
curl --location 'https://ephemeral-protected.api.perf-test.cdp-int.defra.cloud/fg-cw-backend/cases/{CASE_ID}' \
--header 'Content-Type: application/json' \
--header 'Accept: application/json' \
--header 'Authorization: Bearer eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJSUzI1NiIsIng1dCI6InlFVXdtWFdMMTA3Q2MtN1FaMldTYmVPYjNzUSIsImtpZCI6InlFVXdtWFdMMTA3Q2MtN1FaMldTYmVPYjNzUSJ9..F_Bv7n-wOgaBG5shoz65jcNLCc_1rZGL5k9HiOtTOw4vMBXOymtVbJNJeuSuRx1ERJkXHb15vxTqP67aEKEGGSvNwM9_5mHj54QXXOwWUDnnQL1TPRhuvxIHy6Y65ZR2QRrGGCuA45lTGdEbdzjnKBlTrfJkw_cBISVMurxx9D9qkB8iVEzWql24yZ28sRfqMHrqR3qTmye3XShdvbB6OZay6xfV8UF7t_bNV8rRk6snq9qnb3QF2T6GezzC7-1ALXbYIjqnR3Ty3sXzq6O-yGTI8_7AncOCqdxHg3L5lPNt36XpMkVK5rdbM7Kpivla1PhfiyAbU-iLpjmAOPP50A' \
```

---

## Notes

- Replace `{CASE_ID}`, `{USER_ID}`, `{STAGE_ID}`, `{TASK_GROUP_ID}`, and `{TASK_ID}` with actual values obtained from previous API calls
- All requests use the perf-test environment: `https://ephemeral-protected.api.perf-test.cdp-int.defra.cloud`
- Authorization headers are consistent across all calls:
  - `Authorization: Bearer [JWT_TOKEN]`
  - `x-api-key: 6QK0HOO85yA1FeR5Aaz7FJhf7B3ZMyCW`
- Steps 10 and 13 may involve multiple API calls (one for each task in the stage)
- Step 5 involves polling with 3-second intervals, up to 5 attempts
